translation.Message_0_Page_0: I'm Dan Kaby. I came here from abroad, and here it's ... <pause> Well, it turns out that I can't leave ... Well <pause> I'm going to trust you, okay? Here I buy sweets, but they are unusual ... <pause> They are from local berries. don't worry, you don't get any of the nasty effects from the raw berries like poison, though they have only one side effect ...
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Although you can only make them with your own hands, I'll show you how. *showed the sheet from the records*
